prompts:
/classify_issue {"number": "1", "title": "Enhance README to showcase Jerry's power and flexibility", "body": "/adw_plan_build_iso


 ## Description
 Update the main README.md to better reflect the robust nature, power, and flexibility of Jerry - the most advanced agentic layer for
 modern apps.
 ## Goals
 - Highlight Jerry as a production-ready agentic layer framework
 - Cover core features: ADWs, slash commands, worktree isolation, multi-source issues
 - Emphasize scalability, observability, and composability
 - Make the value proposition clear and compelling

 ## Acceptance Criteria
 - [ ] README showcases Jerry's unique capabilities
 - [ ] Core features are documented with examples
 - [ ] Value proposition is clear in the first few paragraphs
 - [ ] Structure follows best practices for open source READMEs"}
